speaker: Agent
text: Hi John, this is Sarah from XYZ Collections. I'm reaching out regarding your account with Fast Loans.

speaker: Customer
text: Oh, I see. What's going on?

speaker: Agent
text: I just wanted to discuss your outstanding balance. Before that, can you confirm your address for me?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you. Your account shows a balance of $450. How would you like to proceed with the payment?

speaker: Customer
text: I can pay half of it today, if that works.

speaker: Agent
text: That sounds good! Would you prefer to pay by debit or credit card?

speaker: Agent
text: Great! Please provide the card number when you're ready.

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you, John. I will process that payment for you now.

speaker: Customer
text: Thank you, I appreciate your help.

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome! Have a great day.
